title: Cox's Bazar
description: Cox's Bazar is a famous tourist destination in Bangladesh known for its long natural sea beach. It's a popular spot for beach lovers and offers a variety of water activities.

title: Sundarbans
description: The Sundarbans is a vast mangrove forest in Bangladesh, home to the Bengal tiger. It's a UNESCO World Heritage Site and an important ecosystem for wildlife conservation.

title: Sreemangal
description: Sreemangal is often called the 'Tea Capital of Bangladesh' due to its lush tea gardens. It's a serene place for nature enthusiasts and offers beautiful landscapes.

title: Sajek
description: Sajek Valley is a picturesque hill station in the Chittagong Hill Tracts of Bangladesh. It's known for its lush green hills, indigenous communities, and stunning natural beauty.
